name: Into The Farlands
description:
Into the Farlands is a new Survival Hack and Slash experience set in a unique Mesoamerican-inspired Dark-Fantasy Adventure.

Monsters and Critters

Fight against waves of cursed Crimson monsters that have taken over the Farlands! As you discover new enemies and other exotic critters, you will update your Bestiary journal! Everyone is counting on you to find a way to end the Crimson Curse!

Mesoamerican Characters and Locations

Interact with interesting characters, both explorers and villagers and complete side quests to uncover the game's deeper story! Expand your map as you explore dangerous jungles, fetid swamps, majestic waterfalls, ancient dungeons, and lots of trails.

Treasure and Collectibles!

There are many artifacts to collect for those who like completion runs! Explore ancient temple dungeons, solve puzzles, and fight bosses to collect as much gold as you can!

Ongoing Story

This is the first chapter in an ongoing story! New chapters will be patched in as development continues! Join our Discord Community and join the discussion for the future!
